sentences.en: I heard the professor's discourse on English lexicography.
sentences.cn: 我听了教授所作的关于英语辞典学的学术讲演.

sentences.en: Ilson, Robert ( ed. ) , Lexicography : An emerging international profession . Manchester : Manchester University Press. 1986.
sentences.cn: 胡明扬 等, 《 词典学 概论》, 中国人民大学出版社, 1982.

sentences.en: It turns out that Corpora have great advantages in lexicography.
sentences.cn: 语料库在词典编纂中具有强大的优势。

sentences.en: Of or relating to lexicography or a lexicon.
sentences.cn: 属于或关于词典编纂法的.

sentences.en: Phrase equivalence pair is very useful for bilingual lexicography, machine translation and crossing - language information retrieval.
sentences.cn: 摘要短语等价对在词典编纂 、 机器翻译和 跨语言 信息检索中有着广泛的应用.

sentences.en: The technology of lexicography based on corpus has been the main method for contemporary lexicography.
sentences.cn: 基于语料库的词典编纂技术已经成为现代词典编纂的主流方法.

sentences.en: Thirty-odd persons' long and distinguished service to lexicography has brought the dictionary within sight of completion.
sentences.cn: 余人对词典编纂长期和卓越的贡献使这部词典完成在望。

sentences.en: This book fills a major gap in lexicography.
sentences.cn: 这本书填补了词典学方面的重大缺门.

words.tran_cn: 词汇的；[语] 词典的；词典编纂的

trans.tran_en: the skill, practice, or profession of writing dictionaries
